CustomField.description: This checkbox will identify the GRANTOR as a Mortgagor. Mortgagor is the owner of the collateral of type "real estate" that has a senior lien.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox will identify the GRANTOR as a Mortgagor. Mortgagor is the owner of the collateral of type "real estate" that has a senior lien.
CustomField.label: Mortgagor
